location_machine_xrefs.condition: 50¢/Play. Blown out, barely functional, lots of segments missing on score and credit displays. Filthy playfield, bad shooter, plays slow, some lights have been replaced since last time I played so a little less dark. Cool playfield with some neat gimmicks. Too bad it's in such rough shape.

machine_conditions.comment: 50¢/Play. Blown out, barely functional, lots of segments missing on score and credit displays. Filthy playfield, bad shooter, plays slow, some lights have been replaced since last time I played so a little less dark. Cool playfield with some neat gimmicks. Too bad it's in such rough shape.

50¢/Play. Blown out, barely functional, lots of segments missing on score and credit displays. Filthy playfield, plays slow, so many lights out it's VERY HARD to see what's going on. Had 7 credits on it this time when I tried it, so many people are clearly still walking away from this disaster. Cool playfield with some neat gimmicks, though. Too bad it's in such rough shape.

25¢/Play (I think, it's DARK).  Blown out, barely functional, lots of segments missing on score and credit displays. Filthy playfield, plays slow, so many lights out it's VERY HARD to see what's going on.  Had 6 credits on it when I tried it, so many people are clearly walking away from this disaster.

location_machine_xrefs.condition:
Tested 10/21/19. Played advanced game as Greyjoy by holding right flipper button for 5 seconds then pressing start. Put up a 700mil+ high score in test.  Cleaned flipper button to minimize sticking. 
$1/play or $5/6 Plays The only Game of Thrones Premium for location play north of Sacramento. Running latest v1.37 software. Color screen, shaker motor, speaker lights, art blades, Castle dragon topper, led lighting, drink holder, well maintained. Set to casual mode, but hold right flipper button until advanced mode displayed on screen before starting new game to choose your house manually. Wood foundation of this location makes the shaker motor literally feel like a mini earthquake when it goes off. Very cool effect.
